vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
οἰκτ-ιρμός, ὁ,
pity, compassion, [Refs 5th c.BC+]: plural, compassionate feelings, mercies, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
compassion, mercy, pity
compassion; kindness, pity in relieving sorrow and want, Phil. 2:1; Col. 3:12; Heb. 10:28; favor, grace, mercy, Rom. 12:1; 2Cor. 1:3*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 同情, 憐憫, 慈悲
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 同情, 怜悯, 慈悲
